suspicious_activity.narrative: From February to August 2025, Cindy Clayton (ID: CUST_0057) conducted numerous transactions with sudden increases in amounts and frequency. Notably, there were large ATM withdrawals and cash deposits, including a $7,491.44 ATM withdrawal and a $6,933.66 cash deposit in late July and early August. This activity appears to be structured to evade reporting requirements, potentially indicative of money laundering.
suspicious_activity.ai_reasoning: Customer with high risk rating showed sudden increase in transaction amounts and frequency, particularly ATM withdrawals and cash deposits, which could be indicative of structuring or layering.
